com.sinch.verification

Interface ConfigBuilder


  • public interface ConfigBuilder
    ConfigBuilder builds a Config instance. The required configuration parameters are:
    • (Android) Application context
    • Application key
    The optional configuration parameter is:
    • Sinch environment host

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ConfigBuilder applicationKey(String applicationKey)
      Sets the application key.
      Config build()
      Instantiates a Config object with the currently assigned configuration parameters.
      ConfigBuilder context(android.content.Context context)
      Sets the application context.
      ConfigBuilder environmentHost(String environmentHost)
      Sets the Sinch environment host.

    • Method Detail

      • context

        ConfigBuilder context(android.content.Context context)
        Sets the application context.
        Parameters:
        context - Must not be null.
        Returns:
        A ConfigBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if context is null.

      • applicationKey

        ConfigBuilder applicationKey(String applicationKey)
        Sets the application key.
        Parameters:
        applicationKey - Must not be null.
        Returns:
        A ConfigBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if applicationKey is null or empty.

      • environmentHost

        ConfigBuilder environmentHost(String environmentHost)
        Sets the Sinch environment host. It is optional to assign the environment host. If not explicitly set, the default Sinch environment will be used.
        Parameters:
        environmentHost - Must not be null.
        Returns:
        A ConfigBuilder instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if environmentHost is null or empty.

      • build

        Config build()
        Instantiates a Config object with the currently assigned configuration parameters.
        Returns:
        A new Config instance.
